TopicTitle: Long time lurker, first time poster

Articles.Content: Hi all, like the title says I've lurked around and learned a ton on here for quite a while and figured I might as well start throwing a few lines back. Just starting a new career and added a few more mods including life support and failures which has increased thought given to design.

Hello Doug8421 and welcome to the forum!

Come on in from the cold, lurker.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
